Uses of Interface
org.fruit.alayer.Taggable

  • Packages that use Taggable 
    Package Description
    org.fruit.alayer  
    org.fruit.alayer.actions  

    • Uses of Taggable in org.fruit.alayer

      Subinterfaces of Taggable in org.fruit.alayer 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Action
      Actions take a system and a state as parameters and operate on the system (e.g. a left click).
      interface  State
      A state describes an SUT's state.
      interface  SUT
      An SUT is a System Under Test and can be a graphical application, a process, a collection of processes or even a collection of distributed services.
      interface  Widget
      A Widget is usually a control element of an SUT.
      Classes in org.fruit.alayer that implement Taggable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StdState 
      class  StdWidget 
      class  SUTBase 
      class  TaggableBase 

    • Uses of Taggable in org.fruit.alayer.actions

      Classes in org.fruit.alayer.actions that implement Taggable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActivateSystem 
      class  CompoundAction
      An action that is composed of several other actions.
      class  KeyAction
      An action which presses a given Key on the Keyboard.
      class  KeyDown
      An action which presses a given Key on the Keyboard.
      class  KeyUp
      An action which releases a given Key on the Keyboard.
      class  KillProcess
      An action that kills a process by PID or by Name.
      class  MouseDown
      An action which presses a given Button on the StandardMouse of an SUT.
      class  MouseGesture
      An action which moves the cursor of the StandardMouse of an SUT to a given position.
      class  MouseMove 
      class  MouseUp
      An action which releases a given Button on the StandardMouse of an SUT.
      class  NOP
      The 'No Operation' action.
      class  Type
      An action that types a given text on the StandardKeyboard of the SUT.
      class  Wait
      An action that simply waits a given amount of seconds.
